description.iv_curve: Current-voltage characteristics showing operating voltage and current density
description.eis: Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy data at multiple operating conditions
description.overpotential_stress: Overpotentials (anode, cathode, ohmic) with induced stress from Ni oxidation
description.multi_temperature: IV curves at various operating temperatures
description.degradation: Time-series data showing performance degradation over operational lifetime

key_phenomena.oxygen_chemical_potential: Gradient across electrolyte drives ionic current
key_phenomena.anode_oxidation: High overpotentials can lead to local Ni to NiO oxidation
key_phenomena.volume_change_stress: NiO formation causes 68% volume expansion, inducing stress
key_phenomena.stress_coupling: Electrochemical loading couples to mechanical stress through oxidation
